name: openSquat
description: The openSquat is an open-source project for phishing domain and domain squatting detection by searching daily newly registered domains impersonating legit domains.

api_methods.name: Get Daily Domains
api_methods.description: Get the daily list of domains that have been registered in the past day that have a similar word to {keyword} - the keyword should not contain any domain, e.g: Google

utterances.utterance: Can you find domains registered yesterday that are similar to Amazon?
Show me the list of domains from the past day that resemble Facebook.
What domains were registered yesterday that are similar to Netflix?
Find domains registered in the last day that are similar to Microsoft.
Give me the daily domains that are similar to Tesla.
List the domains registered yesterday that are similar to Apple.
Can you show domains from the past day that are similar to Spotify?
What are the domains registered yesterday that resemble Twitter?
Find domains from the last day that are similar to Instagram.
Show me the domains registered yesterday that are similar to LinkedIn.
